title: How to Make a GroupMe Group: Complete Set Up Guide

steps.title: Open the GroupMe app.
steps.content: Open the GroupMe app. This looks like a white speech bubble with a # and ) . [1] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source If you don't have GroupMe, you can download it for iPhone or iPad in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store .

steps.title: Tap the Chats tab.
steps.content: Tap the Chats tab. This looks like overlapping message bubbles.

steps.title: Tap the "New chat" button.
steps.content: Tap the "New chat" button. This looks like a pencil inside of a square at the bottom-right corner of the screen. If you don't see this button and you're using an iPad, tap Chat at the top first.

steps.title: Tap Group.
steps.content: Tap Group . This will be next to an icon of two people. The Group creation page will open.

steps.title: Enter your group name.
steps.content: Enter your group name. The name must be 140 characters or under.

steps.title: Add an avatar and description (optional).
steps.content: Add an avatar and description (optional). While not required to create a group, using an avatar and description can help differentiate other groups if you have more than one. To assign an avatar, tap the square at the top and select a photo from your gallery. To set a description, type into the Add a description field. You can use up to 250 characters.

steps.title: Tap the checkmark.
steps.content: Tap the checkmark. This is in the top-right corner. The group will be created. You may see Done instead of a checkmark.

steps.title: Add members.
steps.content: Add members. You can enter a name, email address, or phone number at the top to search for new contacts. If you already have contacts added, you can find them in the Contacts tab. If you'd rather share a joinable link, tap Share and select Copy . You can then paste the link elsewhere, such as another messaging app or social media. Keep in mind that anyone with the link can join, so be sure to share it privately with those you want to invite. If you want to remove a member after they've joined, tap the group avatar, tap Members , and then tap the person. Tap Remove from group . [2] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Change your settings (optional).
steps.content: Change your settings (optional). Once you add members, you'll be able to change your group's settings. If you don't automatically see this option, tap your group's avatar, and then select Settings . Tap Disable sharing to turn off the ability to share your group via link. Tap Personalization to apply a theme or change the default "like" Emoji. Tap Privacy to allow anyone to join or only those after Admin approval Tap Change owner to give ownership of the group to someone else Tap Leave group to leave any group you were invited to Tap End group to permanently delete the group

steps.title: Go to https://web.groupme.com/ in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://web.groupme.com/ in a web browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address or phone number and password to do so now. [3] X Trustworthy Source Microsoft Support Technical support and product information from Microsoft. Go to source

steps.title: Click the Chats tab.
steps.content: Click the Chats tab. This is the tab with the overlapping speech bubbles.

steps.title: Click the "New conversation" button.
steps.content: Click the "New conversation" button. This looks like a pencil inside of a square at the bottom-right corner of the screen. You can find this at the top, next to the Chat header.

steps.title: Click Start group.
steps.content: Click Start group . This will be next to an icon of two people. The Group creation page will open.

steps.title: Enter your group name.
steps.content: Enter your group name. The name must be 140 characters or under. If you want to add an avatar, click the square and select a picture from your device's gallery.

steps.title: Click Create Group.
steps.content: Click Create Group . This is the blue button. A new page will open where you can add members.

steps.title: Add members.
steps.content: Add members. Enter a name, email address, or phone number in the field to search for new contacts. You can also select from your current GroupMe contacts. Once selected, click Add member . If you'd rather share a joinable link, click Share , and then Copy . You can then paste the link elsewhere, such as another messaging app or social media. Keep in mind that anyone with the link can join, so be sure to share it privately with those you want to invite. If you want to remove a member after they've joined, click the group avatar, click Members , and then click the person. Click Remove from group .

steps.title: Change your settings (optional).
steps.content: Change your settings (optional). Once you add members, you'll be able to change your group's settings. If you don't automatically see this option, click your group's avatar, and then select Settings . Click the drop-down menu for each selection to change it. When you're finished with the settings, click X to close it.

steps.title: Open the GroupMe app.
steps.content: Open the GroupMe app. You can download GroupMe from the Microsoft Store app.

steps.title: Click the Chats tab.
steps.content: Click the Chats tab. This is the tab with the overlapping speech bubbles.

steps.title: Click the "New conversation" button.
steps.content: Click the "New conversation" button. This looks like a pencil inside of a square at the bottom-right corner of the screen. You can find this at the top, next to the Chat header.

steps.title: Click Start group.
steps.content: Click Start group . This will be next to an icon of three people. The Group creation page will open.

steps.title: Enter your group name.
steps.content: Enter your group name. The name must be 140 characters or under. If you want to add an avatar, click the square and select a picture from your device's gallery.

steps.title: Click the arrow.
steps.content: Click the arrow. A new page will open.

steps.title: Add members.
steps.content: Add members. Enter a name, email address, or phone number in the field to search for new contacts. You can also select from your current GroupMe contacts. If you'd rather share a joinable link, click Share , and then Copy . You can then paste the link elsewhere, such as another messaging app or social media. Keep in mind that anyone with the link can join, so be sure to share it privately with those you want to invite.

steps.title: Click the checkmark.
steps.content: Click the checkmark. The group will be created, and the members will be added. If you want to remove a member after they've joined, click the group avatar, click Members , and then click the person. Click Remove from group .
